alert.note: Alert for Columbia (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 9:39AM CDT until April 11 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Louisiana...Arkansas... Bayou Dorcheat Near Springhill affecting Webster Parish and Columbia County. For the Bayou Dorcheat...including Springhill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Dorcheat Near Springhill, Louisiana. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Expect minor lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...The bayou is expected to rise to a crest of 11.0 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 945 AM CDT.
